participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

aeq_section_q01.Description: Alcohol helps a person relax, feel happy, feel less tense, and can keep a person's mind off of mistakes at school or work. | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q02.Description: Alcohol can help how well a person gets along with others (makes people want to have fun together). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q03.Description: Alcohol can hurt how well a person gets along with others (makes people mean to others). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q04.Description: Alcohol helps people think better and helps coordination (people understand things better; can do things better). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q05.Description: Alcohol hurts how people think and it hurts their coordination (run into things, act silly, have a hangover). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q06.Description: Alcohol makes a person feel stronger and more powerful (easier to fight, speak in front of others, stand up to others). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q07.Description: Alcohol can make people more careless or do things that could get them into trouble (do things they feel bad about; do things they regret). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

su_alc_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self_Administered ; 3=Combination [sched_delay] = '7'

aeq_positive_expectancies_nm.Description: Number of items with missing values | Number of items with missing values

aeq_positive_expectancies_nt.Description: Total number of items | Total number of items

aeq_positive_expectancies_ss.Description: Strength of positive expectancies for alcohol. Score prorated if some item responses were missing. | Sum of [aeq_section_q01, aeq_section_q02, aeq_section_q06]

aeq_negative_expectancies_nm.Description: Number of items with missing values | Number of items with missing values

aeq_negative_expectancies_nt.Description: Total number of items | Total number of items

aeq_negative_expectancies_ss.Description: Strength of negative expectancies for alcohol. Score prorated if some item responses were missing. | Sum of [aeq_section_q03, aeq_section_q05, aeq_section_q07]
